name: Xi-Nred & Vos
author: ChatGPT
description: Epic Duels deck for Xi-Nred and Vos.

cards.name: Whispering Gale
cards.rulesText: cost 1SP/1MP — Move up to 3 squares ignoring terrain; you become Stealthed until you attack or take damage.

cards.name: Elemental Pulse
cards.rulesText: cost 2PP/1MP — Deal 3 damage to an enemy within 4 squares and pull them 2 squares toward you.

cards.name: Solitary Vigil
cards.rulesText: cost 3SP — Look at the top 4 cards of your deck; add 2 to hand and return the rest in any order.

cards.name: Storm-Healer
cards.rulesText: cost 1PP/3SP — Heal an ally within 3 squares for 4 HP and grant Regenerating.

cards.name: Kinetic Burst
cards.rulesText: cost 2PP/1MP — Deal 4 damage to an adjacent enemy and push them 2 squares.

cards.name: Wind Step
cards.rulesText: cost 1SP/2MP — Swap places with an ally within 5 squares; both gain Hasted.

cards.name: Cyclone Convergence
cards.rulesText: cost 2PP/1SP/1MP — Deal 3 damage to each adjacent enemy, teleport up to 2 squares, and gain Armor.

cards.name: Invisible Currents
cards.rulesText: cost 1SP/2MP — Gain Stealthed and move up to 4 squares.

cards.name: Zephyr Shield
cards.rulesText: cost 2PP/2SP — Gain a 5-point shield; an ally within 2 squares gains Fortified.

cards.name: Shield Block
cards.rulesText: cost 1SP — Play when an ally within 2 squares is attacked: reduce that damage by 3.

cards.name: Flanking Maneuver
cards.rulesText: cost 1SP/2MP — An ally may move 2 squares; your next attack this turn deals +2 damage.

cards.name: Silent Advance
cards.rulesText: cost 1SP/3MP — Move up to 4 squares ignoring enemy zones; gain Stealthed.

cards.name: Guardian's Strike
cards.rulesText: cost 1PP/1SP/1MP — Deal 3 damage to an adjacent enemy; an ally within 2 squares gains Armor.

cards.name: Tandem Tempest
cards.rulesText: cost 4SP/1MP — After either figure’s attack hits: teleport both Xi-Nred and Vos up to 3 squares each; all adjacent enemies are pushed 2 squares and become Stunned.
